title: Enhance gate error messages
description:
When an automated gate check fails, show the path to the full output file.

## Current Behavior

When `jit gate check <issue> <gate>` fails, the output shows:
```
✗ Gate 'fmt' failed for issue 5863c67c
  Error: Diff in /home/user/project/src/file.rs:123:
```

Only the first line of stderr is displayed. Users don't know where to find the full output.

## Proposed Behavior

When a gate fails, include the path to the result file:
```
✗ Gate 'fmt' failed for issue 5863c67c
  Error: Diff in /home/user/project/src/file.rs:123:
  Full output: .jit/gate-runs/2aa8649a-d747-4326-8b9a-f76dac94a6d7/result.json
```

## Implementation

The `GateRunResult` already contains `run_id`. The file path is:
`.jit/gate-runs/<run_id>/result.json`

Update the gate check output in `main.rs` (around line 1157-1164) to print the file path after showing the error preview.

## Scope

- Only for automated gates (manual gates don't produce result files)
- Human-readable output only (JSON output already contains full result)
- Both `gate check` and `gate check-all` commands
